column4: I wouldn't be surprised if someone were to create an unofficial respin of Ubuntu with Gnome 2 in future - they did that with KDE3.5
I agree with theadmin - Xfce is a pretty good substitute for Gnome 2 and feels quite similar
11.04 on my desktop and big laptop, 10.04 on my netbook
11.04 hasn't been terribly reliable for me either so far
